existing_features.title: Remove the logo image from the top header so that no logo graphic is shown at the top of the screen (keep the rest of the header content and navigation working).
Remove the logo image from the footer so that no logo graphic is shown at the bottom of the screen (keep the rest of the footer content, quick links, and social links intact).

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the logo from the top of the screen and from the bottom/footer
